item.title: BMW E39: Trunk Carpet Replacement
item.description: Today I installed very lightly used carpeting into the trunk of my 2001 BMW 540i/6. The carpeting that was in the vehicle was in very poor condition due to abuse and lack of knowledge by the previous owner. Objective: Refresh the look of your trunk area. Applicable Vehicles: 1996-2003 BMW E39 5-series: 520i, 523i, 525i, 528i, 530i, 535i, 540i, M5. Parts required: Replacement carpet panels. Cost: ~$150 from of online resources.
